features.featureName: Microsoft Defender for Service / Product Offering
features.featureDescription: Service has an offering-specific Microsoft Defender solution to monitor and alert on security issues.
features.featureGuidance:
[Defender for APIs](/azure/defender-for-cloud/defender-for-apis-introduction), a capability of Microsoft Defender for Cloud, offers full lifecycle protection, detection, and response coverage for APIs that are managed in Azure API Management. 

Onboarding APIs to Defender for APIs is a two-step process: enabling the Defender for APIs plan for the subscription, and onboarding unprotected APIs in your API Management instances.  

View a summary of all security recommendations and alerts for onboarded APIs by selecting Microsoft Defender for Cloud in the menu for your API Management instance.
